name: Blundstone Leather Lined 585 Boots - Unisex
description: Beautiful, versatile Blundstone Boots. This style is lined with leather, which is a good thing because you're going to want them to last for a long time. A shock protection system in the midsole makes each step feel light and cushioned. Seamless fusing between the uppers and sole means there's no painful stitching to rub against your toes.Weatherproof leather upper, lined with leather for a softer and more durable wearing experience.Thermo-polyurethane sole is highly abrasion resistant and provides exceptional traction even in Canadian winters.Shock protection reduces skeletal stress by absorbing and dispersing shock. Foot strike shock is reduced by 33%.Pull loops for extra leverage.Round toe, medium width.These are sold in Australian sizes, which are different than Canadian/American sizes. Refer to the size chart to determine your correct size.
